review: I purchased this device over all of the others because of the "Voice Search" feature.  I can say, "Childrens movies", into the remote  and, instantly, I get a huge listing of shows that my Grandkids can choose from.  It really saves time, especially when a 4 year old wants to see some kids shows NOW.  Technically, I feel that a lot of engineering went into this device.  The picture quality is exceptionally clear, and I have NEVER seen the image freeze for buffering.  I would recommend this device over all of the others.

review: At first it was Time Warner raising bills, left them to go to Direct TV and their rates went up as well. I'm tired of having to pay $150+ for TV. Decided to give this a try and couldn't be happier. As a single dad this is great. Prime allows me to all the shows my 4 year old daughter likes and with HBO I get what I like. With Fire and digital antenna I am saving $1500.00 a year!!! Single parents know when you actually get an hour or two to sit down and watch TV you only watch certain things and Amazon TV and Prime deliver. Happy I made the switch, as long as the Prime membership doesn't sky rocket up in the next year this is all I need.
